product_name: Zipp 404 Firecrest Carbon Clincher Wheel - Front
long_description: Weighing in at 715g, the highly anticipated Zipp 404 Firecrest Carbon Clincher Front Wheel offers serious cyclists the speed and durability of 2 yrs. of testing and design in top-performance carbon. The ultralight carbon rim uses Firecrest(R) shaping to optimize the aerodynamic profile of both the front and back halves of the wheel. Wider rim profile increases side-to-side stiffness for responsive sprinting and cornering, as well as great control, crosswind stability, comfort, and strength. 18 spokes are laced radially onto the Zipp 88 hub, which uses Swiss-made cartridge bearings with extremely smooth-rolling grade 10 steel balls. The Zipp 404 Firecrest Carbon Clincher Front Wheel has a maximum tire pressure of 125 psi (8.62 bar). Please note: this wheel is clincher-compatible only and comes with a quick-release skewer, rim tape, valve extender, Tangente butyl tube and Platinum Pro brake pads. Zipp recommends a maximum weight of 250 lbs. (113kg) including rider, bike and gear.
short_description: Weighing in at 715g, the highly anticipated Zipp 404 Firecrest Carbon Clincher Front Wheel offers serious cyclists the speed and durability of 2 yrs. of testing and design in top-performance carbon.
